Projects

Somthing that I've built

1

MONEYFOLIO

Moneyfolio is a responsive web app for tracking expenses. It allows tracking last month and overall spending by searching specific period, category and search term. A chart is also projected in the app based on the transactions associated with each category.

React/Redux/Chart JS/Firestore/Bootstrap4
2

YOUTUNOTE

This web application allows you to take notes while watching videos on the same screen. Both notes and videos can be freely moved and resized, and both can be saved.

Express/node.js/HTML/CSS/Bootstrap4
3

APP using YouTube API

React app for searching and browsing Youtube videos using YouTube API.

React
4

RandomDecisionMaker

This generator makes a quick decision for you by picking a choice from a selection list of items you provide.

Sass/CSS3/HTML5/JS
5

Portfolio website

Built responsive web portfolio with based css-desgined.
